general_advisory: As per Extended Range Forecast of IMD, farmers are advised to start sowing for summer vegetable cultivation. Spraying operations should be done within two days and irrigation should be delayed due to expected cloudy weather.

advisory: Yellow mosaic virus attack symptoms observed, spray Acetamiprid under clear sky
To control aphid and mustard sawfly attack, spray Imidachlorprid or Thiamethoxam and Chloropyriphos under clear weather
Sow sesame crop with appropriate seed rate and treat seeds before sowing
Spray Imazethapyr within 15 days of sowing, delay spraying due to expected rainfall
Start sowing tomato seed for summer cultivation, perform hoeing and weeding in vegetative growth stage
Control leaf eating caterpillar and fruit borer in Brinjal, spray Emamectin Benzoate after rainfall
Control leaf eating caterpillar and fruit borer in Chilli with appropriate spray
